column4: hi whats the package that allows ubuntu to install .deb files, just noticed i havent got it?
You have it :D. It's called Gdebi, also, you can use in terminal $ dpkg -i package.deb
In terminal you can use dpkg -i package.deb  for gui, install gdebi (aptitude install gdebi) and then you only double-click it :)
thank you will make note of that for future reference
